title: Otoko no Ko to Nurechau!? Kagai Jugyou
original_name: 男の娘と濡れちゃう!?課外授業
sinopse: Nakamura Kanae teaches at a prep school. One day, tired of her single status, she lures a student, a cute girl called Kajigaya Haruka only to find out she's actually a crossdresser. They have sex anyway, but after that Haruka starts to blackmail Kanae...
